examples.example: 我把采来的鲜花插进漂亮的瓶子里，心情格外愉悦。

translate.english: I put the picked fresh flowers into the beautiful bottle, and I feel extremely happy.

examples.example: 我小心翼翼地把亲手折的星星放进透明的瓶子里，满是成就感。

translate.english: I carefully put the star folded by myself into the transparent bottle, full of a sense of accomplishment.

examples.example: 我将自己的心愿写在纸条上，然后放进了可爱的瓶子里。

translate.english: I wrote my wish on a note and then put it into the lovely bottle.
